allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add document generation capabilities

- Add Excel, Word, PowerPoint generators with corporate templates
- Add PDF Tools for extraction, merging, and form filling
- Add featured tiles with multi-action button support
- Add brand SVG icons for MS Office and Adobe products
- Reorder capabilities to show new features first
- Update changelog to v1.0.8

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Auto-submit document generators and require template usage

- Set autoSubmit=true for Excel, Word, PowerPoint, PDF Tools
- Update Word prompt to require using Alceon Word Template as base
- Update PowerPoint prompt to require using Alceon PowerPoint Template as base

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
